001package com.github.sormuras.bach.project;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.ExternalModuleLocator;
004import com.github.sormuras.bach.ExternalModuleLocators;
005import com.github.sormuras.bach.Project;
006import java.util.Set;
007import java.util.TreeSet;
008import java.util.function.UnaryOperator;
009
010public record ProjectExternals(Set<String> requires, ExternalModuleLocators locators)
011    implements Project.Component {
012
013  @FunctionalInterface
014  public interface Operator extends UnaryOperator<ProjectExternals> {}
015
016  public ProjectExternals withRequiresModule(String module) {
017    var requires = new TreeSet<>(this.requires);
018    requires.add(module);
019    return new ProjectExternals(Set.copyOf(requires), locators);
020  }
021
022  public ProjectExternals withExternalModuleLocator(ExternalModuleLocator locator) {
023    return new ProjectExternals(requires, locators.with(locator));
024  }
025}
